title: Sheikh didn't reply him on WhatsApp & he asks Sheikh to make dua for his exams - assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign [Music] examination in India to pray for me and I know you would be busy and you can't reply for that so right now I'm requesting you my result will be declared within some days so I want you to please pray for me specifically so that I can be selected for that exam first of all faizan I receive thousands of what's up requests and questions and I don't have the time to reply to them nevertheless I remember seeing your message if I'm not mistaken twice and I did make Dua but I don't reply to imagine I have millions of people following me on Instagram YouTube Twitter Facebook whatever if everyone and people have my number if everyone sends me something or at least and expects me to reply to him I wouldn't be able to eat because I would run out of time so I did make Dua to you and I'm once again doing Dua to you again may Allah azzawajal make you achieve the highest uh marks in your examination pass with uh um uh more than what you have expected uh and Allah Knows Best brother
